org.efaps.update.schema.datamodel

Class TypeUpdate.AttributeDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.update.AbstractUpdate.AbstractDefinition
      • org.efaps.update.schema.datamodel.TypeUpdate.AttributeDefinition
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TypeUpdate.AttributeSetDefinition
    Enclosing class:
    TypeUpdate

    public class TypeUpdate.AttributeDefinition
extends AbstractUpdate.AbstractDefinition
    The class defines an attribute of a type.

      • updateInDB

        protected void updateInDB(Instance _instance,
              String _typeName,
              long _setID)
                   throws EFapsException
        For given type defined with the instance parameter, this attribute is searched by name. If the attribute exists, the attribute is updated. Otherwise the attribute is created for this type.
        Parameters:
        _instance - type instance to update with this attribute
        _typeName - name of the type to update
        _setID - id to set
        _attrInstanceId -
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error
        See Also:
        getAttrTypeId(java.lang.String), getSqlTableId(java.lang.String), TODO: throw Exception is not allowed

      • getAttrTypeId

        protected long getAttrTypeId(String _typeName)
                      throws EFapsException
        Makes a search query to return the id of the attribute type defined in type.
        Parameters:
        _typeName - name of the type
        Returns:
        id of the attribute type
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error
        See Also:
        type
